thread.title: The Stranded Bae Saga Is Tearing Twitter Apart

author: dcovucci@thedailydot.com (David Covucci)
title: The Stranded Bae Saga Is Tearing Twitter Apart
text:
â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 Next thing you know she get to telling me how she just got out of a bad relationship and she was trying to relocate â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 Being the Mack I am, I paid for her bus ticket initially to get to Texas. The first time she left mikwaukee â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 I asked her was she good, she didn't answer. Hour later we leave movies and shorty ask me for $12 for some Tampons â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 I was a lil disappointed she gassed my head up big for sex saying how she was gon get me right, back shots all that, bitch on her monthly â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 But we coolin n shit, after the tampon run and "Takiya" (the name she told me) aka #StrandedBae decided to get a little freaky â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 So shorty get to necking, something real crazy, sloppy all that, and bout 3 mins into it I nut UNEXPECTEDLY pic.twitter.com/xgc4iLDWd7 â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 Bitch swallow EVERYTHING and afterwards I slip up and must've fall asleep twitter stay tuned for the shit happens next ! â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 I wake up in the middle of the night to this hoe eating some pizza! I ain't think nothing of it at first... but then I realized â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 How the fuck she order this fuckin pizza?! I ask her where it come from, & she says "she used my card" â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 she asked me to borrow $50 so she could pay for a class to get her CNA license and start working again â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 I decided to give her one more chance, 2 hours later I see her on Periscope killing a 5th of henny and smoking a black n mild â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 I got arrested for disorderly conduct, and she issued a RESTRAINING order out on ME BRAH!!!! Like bitch seriously?!?! â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 I poured a whole bottle of water on her, bitch got make up washed off, weave was wet, but I was happy â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 I got arrested for disorderly conduct, and she issued a RESTRAINING order out on ME BRAH!!!! Like bitch seriously?!?! â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 to this day I am still blocked, if u see her around just know, I made that ass fat . I began this #StrandedBae bitch. I was first victim â€” LIL BRUZER (@LilMotorByke) February 20, 2017 There are several other threads like that , all accusing the woman of similar behavior. #StrandedBae denied those. It's crazy to me how many people deadass making up these threads when they know none of that shit ever happened. Like y'all weird bro 
Even #StrandedBae's mom jumped in. This bobby brown looking nigga, was all over my daughter sweating her n shit pic.twitter.com/2MjQWCKwGh â€” Tina King (@MsTinaKing1) February 20, 2017 
The mouse got its own parody account and started sparring with the mother. This whole situation is absolutely hilarious & the mom is fighting with a mouse on twitterðŸ’€ lordt @KashMoneyKanee @__iamqueenk #StrandedBae pic.twitter.com/6AJOntK3mx â€” ewurama (@beanutbutter33) February 20, 2017 Anyway, the whole experience left Twitter perplexed. Woke up to #strandedbae trending and I have no clue why cuz I can't find the original thread pic.twitter.com/aHBx9AAEBE â€” Sly Stone (@YaBoyChrisHov) February 20, 2017 me trying to piece together all the information #StrandedBae pic.twitter.com/vFLtwFBHbU
